parameter.description: true = the method checks the aromaticity, false = aromaticity has already been checked.
true = the method checks the aromaticity, false = aromaticity has already been checked.

descriptorImpl.description: Number of atoms of a certain element type.
descriptorImpl.name: AtomCount

parameter.description: Element name. Wild card * means all atoms

descriptorImpl.description: ATS autocorrelation descriptor, where the weight equal to the charges.
descriptorImpl.name: AutocorrelationDescriptorCharge

descriptorImpl.description: ATS autocorrelation descriptor, where the weight equal to the scaled atomic mass
descriptorImpl.name: AutocorrelationDescriptorMass

descriptorImpl.description: ATS autocorrelation descriptor, where the weight equal to the charges.
descriptorImpl.name: AutocorrelationDescriptorPolarizability

descriptorImpl.description: Eigenvalue based descriptor noted for its utility in chemical diversity.
descriptorImpl.name: BCUT

parameter.description: Number of highest eigenvalues. 0 (default) means all.
Number of lowest eigenvalues. 0 (default) means all.
true = the method checks the aromaticity, false = aromaticity has already been checked.

descriptorImpl.description: Number of bonds of a certain bond order.
descriptorImpl.name: BondCount

descriptorImpl.description: Sum of the absolute value of the difference between atomic polarizabilities of all bonded atoms in the molecule (including implicit hydrogens)
descriptorImpl.name: BPol

descriptorImpl.description: Topological descriptor characterizing the carbon connectivity.
descriptorImpl.name: CarbonTypes

descriptorImpl.description: Evluates the simple and valence chi chain descriptors of orders 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7.
descriptorImpl.name: ChiChain

descriptorImpl.description: Evaluates chi cluster descriptors
descriptorImpl.name: ChiCluster

descriptorImpl.description: Evaluates chi path cluster descriptors
descriptorImpl.name: ChiPathCluster

descriptorImpl.description: Evaluates chi path descriptors
descriptorImpl.name: ChiPath

descriptorImpl.description: Calculates 29 Charged Partial Surface Area (CPSA) descriptors.
descriptorImpl.name: CPSA

descriptorImpl.description: A topological descriptor combining distance and adjacency information.
descriptorImpl.name: EccentricConnectivityIndex

descriptorImpl.description: Returns the complexity (NilaComplexity) of a system, defined as C=abs(B^2-A^2+A)+H/100 where C=complexity, A=number of non-hydrogen atoms, B=number of bonds and H=number of heteroatoms
descriptorImpl.name: FragmentComplexity

descriptorImpl.description: Descriptor characterizing the mass distribution of the molecule.
descriptorImpl.name: GravitationalIndex

descriptorImpl.description: Calculates the number of hydrogen bond acceptors using a slightly simplified version of the PHACIR atom types.
descriptorImpl.name: HBondAcceptorCount

parameter.description: true = the method checks the aromaticity, false = aromaticity has already been checked.

descriptorImpl.description: Calculates the number of hydrogen bond donors using a slightly simplified version of the PHACIR atom types.
descriptorImpl.name: HBondDonorCount

descriptorImpl.description: returns the ionization potential of a molecule.
descriptorImpl.name: IPMolecularLearning

parameter.description: If true lone pairs are added to the molecule.

descriptorImpl.description: Kier and Hall kappa molecular shape indices compare the molecular graph with minimal and maximal molecular graphs; they are intended to capture different aspects of molecular shape.
descriptorImpl.name: KappaShapeIndices

descriptorImpl.description: A fragment count descriptor that uses e-state fragments.
descriptorImpl.name: KierHallSmarts

descriptorImpl.description: Returns the number of atoms in the largest chain.
descriptorImpl.name: LargestChain

parameter.description: true = the method checks the aromaticity, false = aromaticity has already been checked.
True is the CDKConstant.ISINRING has to be set

descriptorImpl.description: Number of atoms in the largest pi system.
descriptorImpl.name: LargestPiSystemDescriptor

parameter.description: true = the method checks the aromaticity, false = aromaticity has already been checked.

descriptorImpl.description: Evaluates length over breadth descriptors.
descriptorImpl.name: LengthOverBreadth

descriptorImpl.description: number of atoms in the longest aliphatic chain
descriptorImpl.name: LongestAliphaticChain

parameter.description: True is the CDKConstant.ISINRING has to be set

descriptorImpl.description: Calculates the Molecular Distance Edge descriptor
descriptorImpl.name: MDE

descriptorImpl.description: Calculates the moment of inertia and radius of gyration.
descriptorImpl.name: MomentOfInertia

descriptorImpl.description: According to the Petitjean definition, the eccentricity of a vertex corresponds to the distance from that vertex to the most remote vertex in the graph.
descriptorImpl.name: PetitjeanNumber

descriptorImpl.description: Evaluates the Petitjean shape indices.
descriptorImpl.name: PetitjeanShapeIndex

descriptorImpl.description: The number of rotatable bonds is given by the SMARTS specified by Daylight.
descriptorImpl.name: RotatableBondsCount

descriptorImpl.description: Returns the number failures of the Lipinski's Rule Of 5.
descriptorImpl.name: RuleOfFive

parameter.description: true = the method checks the aromaticity, false = aromaticity has already been checked.

descriptorImpl.description: Calculation of topological polar surface area based on fragment contributions (TPSA).
descriptorImpl.name: TPSA

parameter.description: true = the method checks the aromaticity, false = aromaticity has already been checked.

descriptorImpl.description: Vertex adjacency information (magnitude): 1 + log2 m where m is the number of heavy-heavy bonds. If m is zero, then zero is returned.
descriptorImpl.name: VAdjMa

descriptorImpl.description: weight of atoms of a certain element type.
descriptorImpl.name: Weight

parameter.description: If *, returns the molecular weight, otherwise the weight for the given element

descriptorImpl.description: Evaluates the weighted path descriptors.
descriptorImpl.name: WeightedPath

descriptorImpl.description: Holistic descriptors described by Todeschini et al. The descriptors are based on a number of atom weightings.
descriptorImpl.name: WHIM

parameter.description: Weighting scheme used. Possible values are: 'unity', 'mass', 'volume', 'eneg', and 'polar'.

descriptorImpl.description: This descriptor calculates the Wiener numbers. This includes the Wiener Path number and the Wiener Polarity Number.
descriptorImpl.name: WienerNumbers

descriptorImpl.description: Prediction of logP based on the atom-type method called XLogP.
descriptorImpl.name: XLogP

parameter.description: true = the method checks the aromaticity, false = aromaticity has already been checked.
True is to use the salicyl acid correction factor

descriptorImpl.description: The sum of the squares of atom degree over all heavy atoms i.
descriptorImpl.name: ZagrebIndex
